Package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer

This package contains the objects that facilitate the customer transaction of the vending machine.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeGiver
    This control object manages the giving of change to the Customer.
    CoinButton
    This boundary class CoinButton represent the coin to be displayed on the CustomerPanel.
    CoinInputBox
    This interface object is part of the Customer Panel. It is used to enter Coins into the vending machine.
    CoinInputListener
    This control object implements the coin denomination selection (button presses by the customer) on the Customer Panel when coins are entered for a drink to be dispensed. Action will be performed in corresponding to the button pressed.
    CoinReceiver
    This control object manages the input and storage of Coins.
    CustomerPanel
    This class Customer Panel display the GUI interactive with the Customer. This panel simulates the vending machine's customer interface panel. It will enable the user (Customer) to: insert coins; select Brands; terminate Transaction. It will also provide the following display functions; display total money inserted.
    DispenseController
    This control object is for handling the dispense drink use case.
    DrinkSelectionBox
    This interface object is part of the Customer Panel. It is used by the Customer to select a drink.
    DrinkSelectionItem
    This boundary object enables a drink to be displayed and selected. It also displays the stock availability of the drink.
    DrinkSelectionListener
    This control object monitors the selection of drink (drink brand) by a customer in the Customer Panel.
    TerminateButtonListener
    This control object monitors the Terminate Button on the Customer Panel and informs the Transaction Controller when it is pressed.
    TransactionController
    This control object coordinates the customer transactions for selection of a drink brand, coin input, storage of coins and termination requests for ongoing transactions.

Package sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer Description

This package contains the objects that facilitate the customer transaction of the vending machine.
